title: Code Sharing App - NoteCode
description: As a simple full-stack project challenge, NoteCode is a simple code sharing application, which tests basic skills of a Fullstack developer. In this challenge, you need to create an app that let users to store and share coding snippets.

userStories.content: Create an Coding Sharing App - NoteCode following given design.
By default, users should see a HTML given snippet. See `Code Guide` for default HTML code.
When users select `Share` button, a new ID should be generated, users can access the saved code with the generated ID. See `Code Guide` for more details.
Users can choose the language and theme that they want to save and share.
The application should be responsive on all devices.
Deploy the solution and submit Repository URL and Demo URL.
